Network Address :

10101100.00010111.10100100.000 00000 => 172.23.164.0

27-16(Class B) => 11 bits are borrowed from host portion

Number of Subnets possible => 2^11 => 2048

Number of host bits remaining available => 16(default) - 11(subnetbits) => 5 bits

Number of Hosts possbile in each subnet => (2^5)-2 => 32-2 => 30
